entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.2°C

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning except plus 3 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning except plus 3 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow mixed with rain. High zero except plus 3 near the Trans-Canada Highway. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow or rain in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 40 gusting to 60 in the morning then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High zero except plus 3 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12 except minus 6 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 12 except minus 6 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 March 2023
